name: Jeremy Keith
intro: Jeremy is respected voice within our industry, having spoken at notable conferences such as An Event Apart, Mobilism, Web Directions, SXSW, DIBI and Build. He has also written three books on Javascript and HTML5..

name: Vitaly Friedman
title: Vitaly Friedman loves beautiful content and doesn’t like to give in easily. Vitaly is writer, speaker, author and editor-in-chief of Smashing Magazine. He runs responsive Web design workshops and loves solving complex performance problems

name: Patrick Hamann
intro: Patrick is a lead client-side engineer at the Guardian in London where – amongst other things – he is helping to build the next generation of their web platform, and is a well-known performance expert.

name: Alex Feyerke
intro: Huge advocate for Offline First. Part of the Hood.ie team, and loves spending time with friends in parks, riding his bike and always enjoys a good bouldering session.

name: David Rousset
intro: David Rousset is a Senior Program Manager at Microsoft, in charge of driving adoption of HTML5 standards. He’s the co-author of the WebGL Babylon.js open-source engine.

name: Lea Verou
intro: Lea is a speaker, author of "CSS Secrets", and an Invited Expert in the CSS Working Group. She worked as a Developer Advocate for the W3C and is currently a Research Assistant at MIT.
